titleText:
Connect your phone or open the emulator.
Open GameController.py and wait to detect the device.
Do the following instructions (on GameController, not smartphone/emulator.
When you're done, press the 'done' near button.
endingText: Thank you for the support. Please send the file {} to the developer
questions: Check on the interface if a device is connected
When your character (on phone) has entered level 1, pause this game
Wait until the bot arrives at level 2 (heal) and then stop the bot
Make the bot start from level 2
